actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the support of the efforts of the United Kingdom to reclaim the territory of the Falkland Islands.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the United States should: (1) support the efforts of the United Kingdom to reclaim the Falkland Islands; (2) condemn the occupation of the Islands by Argentina; and (3) urge the prompt withdrawal of Argentine forces from the Islands.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the support of the efforts of the United Kingdom to reclaim the territory of the Falkland Islands.
